WFAPI::MapDrawingCallback

WFAPI::MapDrawingCallback Class Reference

virtual void mapIsReadyToBeDrawn ()=0

Detailed Description

This class is used to notify the application when a map is ready to be drawn unto the surface.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

virtual void WFAPI::MapDrawingCallback::mapIsReadyToBeDrawn (  )  [pure virtual]

When this is called, the application should trigger a redraw of the platform specific surface.
